meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>relationship</kanji> <kanji>fix</kanji> is <vocabulary>reconciliation</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>making peace</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>making up</vocabulary> with someone.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the kun'yomi readings. For 仲 you're fine. That's what you learned with the kanji. For 直り think back to the vocab word 直る. That's what's going on here.
